stepAnswer: SELECT FirstName, LastName FROM Student ORDER BY LastName DESC;
stepTitle: To sort a list of students in descending order by last name, you can use this statement:
choices: SELECT FirstName, LastName FROM Student ORDER BY LastName DESC;
SELECT FirstName, ORDER BY LastName DESC;
SELECT FirstName, LastName FROM Student ORDER BY LastName;
SELECT FirstName, LastName FROM Student WHERE ORDER BY LastName DESC;
